CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS( APT_PostBillPay_Channel__c , 'OTC') && (CONTAINS( APT_PostBillPay_Channel__c , 'Phone') || CONTAINS( APT_PostBillPay_Channel__c , 'Internet') || CONTAINS( APT_PostBillPay_Channel__c , 'Scan and Pay')), 'No', IF(CONTAINS( APT_PostBillPay_Channel__c , 'OTC'), 'Yes', 'No'))
CustomField.label: Channel OTC Only?
